title: Orange, white chocolate and cardamom langues de chat
description: Delicate orange biscuits with a hint of cardamom are dipped in white chocolate for a luxurious touch.
ingredients: 125g/4½oz icing sugar, portioned into 100g/3½ oz and 25g/1oz parts, both sieved
1 to 2 oranges (depending on size), zest only
1 tsp cardamom pods, seeds only, ground
